sentences.sContent: There are a few things we need to discuss.
sentences.sCn: 有些事情我们需要讨论。

sentences.sContent: There must be easier ways of doing this.
sentences.sCn: 这事一定还有更简单的做法。

sentences.sContent: There seems to be a lack of communication.
There remain several questions still to be answered.
Suddenly there was a loud explosion.
sentences.sCn: 突然传出一声巨大的爆炸声。

sentences.sContent: They were all laughing when there came a knock at the door.
sentences.sCn: 他们都在大笑，这时传来了敲门声。

synos.tran: 在那里；在那边；在那点上

phrases.pCn: 到达那里；取得成功，实现目标
这边请；这下你会懂了；你又来这一套
不相干；与题目不相干；不重要

words.tran: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

trans.tranOther: used to say that something exists or happens
